summary: Abby's made a 16 wishes list for her 16th birthday. She gets 16 magic candles - 1 wish per hour. Things are fine in the beginning.
cast: Debby Ryan|Jean-Luc Bilodeau|Anna Mae Wills|Karissa Tynes|Kendall Cross|Patrick Gilmore|Cainan Wiebe|Keenan Tracey|Jesse Reid|Joel Semande|Brenda Crichlow|Jenna Romanin|Eva Bourne|Gary Jones|Patricia Isaac|Alistair Abell|Dan Joffre|Kailey Cross|Mitch Duffield|Alyssa Wellington
keywords: wish|16 year old|16th birthday|remake|be careful what you wish for
title: 16 deseos
